Package org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts

Class BaseMeterController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.controllers.AbstractControllerContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.controllers.AbstractController
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts.BaseMeterController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller
    final class BaseMeterController
extends AbstractController
    Controller implementation to create charts like meter of gauges, extending doughnut chart.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private static class  BaseMeterController.BaseMeterControllerProvier
      Inner class which is implementing a ControllerProvider to create a base meter controller.

      • drawLabels

        void drawLabels​(IsChart chart,

        Draws the labels in the center of doughnut chart.

      • calculateEase

        private double calculateEase​(IsChart chart,
                             MeterDataset dataset)
        Calculates the easing based on circumference of the data set element.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance to use for calculation
        dataset - meter data set to get the ratio between value and maximum
        Returns:
        easing of drawing (between 0 and 1) for animation

      • execute

        private void execute​(BaseMeterChart<?> chart,
                     ChartNode item,
                     MeterDataset dataset,
                     MeterOptions options,
                     double ease)
        Draws the value inside the inner radius of doughnut.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance
        item - chart item with CHART.JS properties needed to calculate the area where to drawn the value
        dataset - the data set instance
        options - the chart options
        ease - easing of drawing (between 0 and 1) for animation

      • calculateFontSize

        private void calculateFontSize​(Context2dItem ctx,
                               double sideOfSquare,
                               String value,
                               IsFont font)
        Calculates the font size based on available space in the square in the doughnut inner radius.
        Parameters:
        ctx - canvas context
        sideOfSquare - side of square
        value - value to display
        font - font instance

      • getColor

        private String getColor​(AbstractMeterElement options,
                        String defaultValue,
                        MeterContext context)
        Returns the color to apply to rendered label, invoking the callback if set.
        Parameters:
        options - options of the element
        defaultValue - default color to use if the callback returns an unconsistent value
        context - scriptable context of meter
        Returns:
        the font color to apply to rendered label

        Returns:
